dr.evomodel.antigenic
Class DistanceDependentCRPGibbsOperator

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.operators.SimpleMCMCOperator
      dr.evomodel.antigenic.DistanceDependentCRPGibbsOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
GibbsOperator, MCMCOperator
public class DistanceDependentCRPGibbsOperator
extends SimpleMCMCOperator
implements GibbsOperator

A Gibbs operator for allocation of items to clusters under a distance dependent Chinese restaurant process.

Author:
Gabriela Cybis, Marc Suchard
